sqlMap.statement: SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO", LifeCyclClsName AS "LIFECYCLCLSNAME", CAST(LodinSeq AS TEXT) AS "LODINSEQ", LifeCyclUseDstcd AS "LIFECYCLUSEDSTCD" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LodinSeq, LifeCyclClsName ) ROWNO, LifeCyclClsName, LodinSeq, LifeCyclUseDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR05 ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIFR05 ( LifeCyclClsName, LodinSeq, LifeCyclUseDstcd ) VALUES ( #lifeCyclClsName#, CAST(#lodinSeq# AS INTEGER), #lifeCyclUseDstcd# )
